lead_paragraph: Sega said users' credit card data was safe, but other information had been compromised. Recent hacking targets have included Citigroup, the International Monetary Fund and Sony.

headline.main: Data for 1.3 Million Customers Stolen in Latest Game Maker Attack
headline.print_headline: Date for 1.3 Million Customers Stolen in Latest Game Maker Attack

snippet: Sega said users' credit card data was safe, but other information had been compromised. Recent hacking targets have included Citigroup, the International Monetary Fund and Sony.
